title: NextStop: Manali Mountain Escape
subtitle: New Year Himalayan Bash 2025
description: Welcome 2025 in the mountains! A curated group trip featuring a stay at 'Into the Wilds', Solang Valley adventures, Atal Tunnel excursion, and an exclusive NYE Gala Dinner.

itinerary.title: Delhi Departure
itinerary.desc: Assemble at Majnu Ka Tilla (7:00 PM). Meet your trip captain and fellow travelers. Board the Force Urbania for an overnight journey to the mountains.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Old Manali Vibes
itinerary.desc: Check into 'Into the Wilds'. Freshen up and explore the charming lanes of Old Manali. Visit Manu Temple and caf√© hop. Evening bonfire and ice-breaking session.

itinerary.title: Solang Valley Adventure
itinerary.desc: Full day excursion to the adventure capital! Try paragliding, ATV rides, or zorbing. Return for a cozy dinner under the stars.

itinerary.title: Atal Tunnel & Sissu
itinerary.desc: Drive through the world's longest highway tunnel to Lahaul Valley. Witness frozen waterfalls in Sissu. Evening preparation for the big night.

itinerary.title: NYE Gala & Celebration
itinerary.desc: The Big Night! Gala dinner, DJ, bonfire, and fireworks to welcome 2025 with your new travel squad.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.desc: Farewell breakfast. Optional rafting in Kullu on the way back. Arrive in Delhi by late evening (10 PM) with a bag full of memories.

title: Coastal Calm: Goa Wellness Retreat
subtitle: Yoga, Surf & Soul
description: A mindful escape to the sunny side of life. Reconnect with yourself through daily yoga, surf lessons, and organic culinary experiences in a boutique heritage villa.

itinerary.title: Welcome Circle
itinerary.desc: Airport pickup and check-in. Sunset intention setting circle followed by a vegan welcome dinner.

itinerary.title: Surf & Sand
itinerary.desc: Morning surf lesson at Ashwem Beach. Afternoon free for leisure. Evening restorative yoga.

itinerary.title: Spice Farm & Culture
itinerary.desc: Visit an organic spice plantation. Learn Goan cooking secrets. Evening sound healing session.

itinerary.title: Sunset Cruise
itinerary.desc: Morning flow. Free time for shopping. Private sunset cruise on the Chapora river.

itinerary.title: Gratitude & Departure
itinerary.desc: Closing circle and breakfast. Transfers to Mopa Airport.
